trends: There have been 10 other sightings in St Joseph
There were no other sightings in St Joseph on or around April 20th 2012
divs: sighting detailswas just out "starwatching" off the back deck late at night. i believe this happened in april, but it could have been early may. hadn't seen anything interesting when suddenly a golden\ yellowish sphere like object, passed across my field of vision, i guess you would say from my right to left, south to north. i was looking in the perfect direction to see it. i can only see a portion of the sky from my deck(due to the way my building faces the woods) so i only saw this thing travel across the sky for about 2 seconds or so. no sound, and no lights of any sort. to me it seemed golden or kind of yellow sphere or egg shaped. soon afterwards i was asking myself if this could have been a bird, which gives you an idea of how low the object was to the ground and treetops. to me it looked like the object was about 100-200 feet above the trees. before this event i had been wondering, what if someone yelled "hello!" at a nearby ufo\spaceship. i can tell you right as this ball like object was about to head over the trees and out of my sight, i was thinking to myself, "should i yell at it?" hell no i was too scared. and before i could finish the thought it was gone. haven't seen that again. kinda wish it zig zagged a little because that would have really freaked me out and added something to the story, but it seemed to be traveling straight, headed who knows where.
Summary: Low flying sphere, no lights shot across the sky, close. Seemed golden or yellowish.
